title: An awkward meeting.
body:
[](https://embed.gyazo.com/18949a60a0826a8baa9612b7eafc5027.jpg)
{{champion:3}} Finally! The day my rework is here! I'm excited!
*Walks up to a counter with Vayne behind it*
{{champion:67}} Do you have your documents?
{{champion:3}} Yes, um... right here.*Hands over documents*
{{champion:67}} *Half-heartedly scans the papers, then hands them back*
ID please.
{{champion:3}} *Hands ID*
{{champion:67}} *Stamps ID, then points* 
Head to Gate W.
{{champion:3}} Um... thank you, you too!
{{champion:3}} So, this is gate W- oof!
{{champion:98}} *Sighs, then picks up dropped papers*
{{champion:3}} Here, let me help-
{{champion:98}} Thanks, but I'm... hey, you're Galio, aren't you?
{{champion:3}} Uh... yeah! Shen, right? Nice to meet you!
{{champion:98}} Congrats on the rework. 
{{champion:3}} Thanks!
{{champion:98}} If you don't mind me asking, what'd they give you? Anything you like?
{{champion:3}} Yeah, they gave me really cool stuff. Like I can charge up a damage reduction shield and then have this ** huge AoE taunt**. And get this, it scales with my resistances!
{{champion:98}} Oh. Sounds... neat.
{{champion:3}} And they gave me this dash with this **huge hitbox that can't be interrupted by CC**, and it knocks up the person I hit!
{{champion:98}} Oh, that's...cool...
{{champion:3}} And I have a huge range dash to an ally that's so fast it might as well be a teleport! And I give them a huge damage reduction buff, and I knock up enemies in a huge radius and everything. And the best part is **it can't be interrupted by CC!**
{{champion:98}} Wow, the cooldown on that must be huge.
{{champion:3}} Yeah, it's a whole 160 seconds.  At least** it isn't the full 3 minutes**, right? Haha. Pretty long for an ultimate, though.
{{champion:98}} ...
{{champion:3}} So... uh... what are you here for?
{{champion:98}} I'm... uh... updating my stats. For... my... nerfs...
{{champion:3}} ...oh.
{{champion:98}} ...
{{champion:3}} ...
{{champion:98}} ...
{{champion:3}} ...
{{champion:98}} ...
{{champion:3}} ...
{{champion:12}} HOLY SHIT GUYS RIOT FINALLY GAVE IT TO ME CHECK OUT THIS HOT MIX
*Starts furiously banging on his cow bell*

replies.body:
{{champion:3}} Hey you fella , what are you...
{{champion:266}} GET OUT!! GET OUT HERE!! EVERYONE GET OUT!
{{champion:3}} Aw sorry  dude, We will leave you alone dont want any trouble
{{champion:266}} Wait you can stay Ali
{{champion:12}} Uhh?? sure
{{champion:266}} ...
{{champion:12}} ...
{{champion:266}} Did I say  stop playing?!!
{{champion:12}} Uh umm no. I'll continue
DONK DONK DONK DONK
{{champion:266}} Beautiful
Someone get me a Jojo-style kanji of "DONK" right now.

{{champion:98}} From...?
{{champion:3}} Um... (you have a point there...)
{{champion:98}} ...because if you're quoting Schwarzenegger you're bringing up REALLY old memories. And not particularly good ones...
{{champion:3}} Um... hasta la vista, then...
######{{champion:98}} The hand bone connected to the... axe bone... gah...

Yes, but Shen can dash over walls and that makes up for his long cooldown on ultimate, since he's so mobile.
/s
Did I ever tell you about the multi-Shen theory?

It's sad, but his wall-dashing breaks the theory- invicible Shen can't stand in a wall, his dash should NOT go through walls, but it does. It must mean that it's one Shen with multiple bodies (such complicated very a lot) and walls in LOL don't actually exist
Believe it or not, but terrain is also made of camouflaged Shens.

\*Reads first quarter\*
\*Suspects this could be a Shen X Galio ship\*
\*Refuses to read the rest... just in case\*

{{champion:240}} YOU CAN NEVER BE TOO CAREFUL.

http://memeguy.com/photos/images/you-can-never-be-too-careful-95128.jpg
